Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-42934 affecting package OpenIPMI for versions less than 2.0.36-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-42934 affecting package OpenIPMI for versions less than 2.0.36-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package OpenIPMI is earlier than 2.0.36-1, affected by CVE-2024-42934
